original_text: Now the servants and officers had made a charcoal fire, because it was cold, and they were standing and warming themselves. Peter also was with them, standing and warming himself.
korean_text: 그 때가 추운 고로 종과 아랫사람들이 불을 피우고 서서 쬐니 베드로도 함께 서서 쬐더라

sentences.original_text: Now the servants and officers had made a charcoal fire
and they were standing and warming themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 서서 몸을 녹이고 있었습니다
